turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about UniversalGiving.
turn.2: UniversalGiving UniversalGiving is an online nonprofit organization based in San Francisco.
turn.4: The organization focuses on raising money for international charities through its web based marketplace, and on matching volunteers with global opportunities.
turn.6: Visitors to their site can search by country or cause, and are given a list of opportunities to give or volunteer.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: UniversalGiving uses a venture capital approach to vetting charities that appear on their site, vetting all opportunities.
turn.10: They don't take any share on donations made through their site.
turn.12: UniversalGiving was founded in 2002 by Pamela Hawley, one of the co-founders of VolunteerMatch.
